documentForm.title: Add document

hero.title: Streamline any application process.
hero.subtitle: ApplyOns simplifies document submissions, verifications, and approvals for universities, embassies, and businesses.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: A complete platform for authenticating academic documents, from the request to delivery by the institution.

authRequest.title: Authentication requests & ADN code
authRequest.description: The applicant creates a request (subject, document type), receives a unique ADN code, pays online, then assigns an institution or invites one by email.
authRequest.more: The ADN code uniquely identifies the request. The invited institution can register via the link received, activate its account by email, then be automatically linked to the request to upload the attested document.

documentDeposit.title: Document upload by the institution
documentDeposit.description: Universities, colleges, and institutes (with an active subscription) access the request via the ADN code and upload the attested document (PDF) in a few clicks.
documentDeposit.more: Supported document types: diplomas, transcripts, certificates, etc. The institution can view the request, upload the PDF, and specify type and mention. The applicant and institution can then view the document and status (documents received, processed).

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions for institutions
subscriptions.description: Institutions subscribe to an active subscription to unlock access by ADN code and upload documents on requests assigned to them.
subscriptions.more: Without an active subscription, the institution cannot enter an ADN code or upload documents. Subscription management (sign-up, renewal, history) is available in the organization space.

workflowNotifications.title: Workflow & notifications
workflowNotifications.description: Request statuses (pending, documents received, processed), notifications for new assignments and updates, real-time tracking for applicants and institutions.
workflowNotifications.more: Each actor receives relevant alerts: new document uploaded, request assigned, invitation to register. The journey is tracked from request creation to the applicant viewing the document.

securityTraceability.title: Security & traceability
securityTraceability.description: Unique ADN code per request, action traceability, data protection, and compliance with best practices for sensitive documents.
securityTraceability.more: Access is controlled by role and permissions. Documents are stored securely; only authorized parties (applicant, assigned institution, admin) can view them. An audit log records important actions.

dashboards.title: Dashboards by profile
dashboards.description: Dedicated spaces by role: applicant (my requests, authentication requests), institution (assigned requests, ADN code, subscriptions), translator, administrator.
dashboards.more: Each profile has tailored menus and views: filtered lists, request details, statistics (active subscriptions, payments), user and organization management for admins.

customForms.title: Custom Forms
customForms.description: Create forms tailored to your specific needs

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Optimize your workflows with intelligent automation

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-Time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Get instant updates on your application status

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Ensure your data is protected with top-notch security measures

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Gain insights with powerful analytics tools

institution.title: Businesses
institution.more: Pricing and terms tailored to your organization's size. Contact us for a custom quote and demo.

applicant.title: Application
applicant.more: Pay-per-request. Ideal for applicants who need to authenticate one or more documents for their applications.

universities.title: Universities, Embassies and Large Organizations
universities.content: Comprehensive application management solution, submission tracking, and advanced analytics tool for universities, embassies, and large-scale organizations.
universities.note: Custom pricing based on your institution's specific needs
universities.more: We offer tailored packages for universities, embassies, and large organizations, with integration and dedicated support.

footer.description: Simplify your application and document verification processes

about.title: About ApplyOns
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing Diploma Verification for a Secure Future

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: ApplyOns is committed to simplifying and securing the academic credential verification process. We create a digital bridge between educational institutions, students, and employers, ensuring the authenticity and integrity of qualifications.
mission.more: Our platform enables institutions to certify documents in a few clicks, students to share verifiable proof with employers, and organizations to reduce fraud risk. We work with academic and professional partners to advance industry standards.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aspire to become the global reference in diploma verification, creating an ecosystem where trust and transparency are at the heart of education and recruitment.
vision.more: In the long term, we aim for international adoption of our ADN code and authentication system, so that every diploma can be verified instantly and securely worldwide, for the benefit of learners, institutions, and recruiters.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and integrity.
trust.more: Each authenticated document carries a unique identifier (ADN code) and can be verified by authorized third parties. We are committed to never altering data without traceability and to protecting user privacy.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push technological boundaries to improve our services.
innovation.more: We invest in fraud detection tools, automated workflows, and dashboards tailored to different profiles (applicants, institutions, translators, administrators) to make verification faster and more reliable.

security.title: Security
security.description: Data protection and confidentiality are at the core of our concerns.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make diploma verification accessible to everyone, everywhere in the world.
accessibility.more: Our interface is designed to be used by institutions of all sizes, from universities to colleges and institutes, as well as by applicants and translation agencies. We offer clear flows and support to ease adoption.

about.ctaText: Have a question or a project? Our team is here to help.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A passionate team dedicated to transforming diploma verification.

brands.title: Trusted by
brands.subtitle: Renowned institutions use ApplyOns for their application processes

designedFor.title: Designed for your needs
designedFor.subtitle: Tailored solutions for every sector to optimize your verification and management processes.

business.title: Business Solutions
business.subtitle: For organizations
business.description: Optimize your verification and application management processes with our dedicated business platform.
business.more: Our platform lets you create authentication requests, assign institutions, and track documents in real time. Businesses and organizations can manage multiple users, view payment statistics, and rely on dedicated support for a smooth rollout.

education.title: Education Solutions
education.subtitle: For institutions
education.description: Simplify diploma verification and academic application management with our specialized tools.
education.more: Universities, colleges, and institutes can subscribe, access requests by ADN code, and upload attested documents (transcripts, diplomas). Department, program, and user management is built in, with notifications for each new assigned request.

verification.title: Fast Verification
verification.more: Each document is linked to a unique ADN code. Institutions and applicants can verify authenticity in a few clicks, with full traceability and compliance with data security best practices.

workflow.title: Optimized Workflow
workflow.more: From submitting the request to payment, then assigning or inviting an institution and uploading the document, the entire journey is guided. Statuses (pending, documents received, processed) provide clear tracking for all parties.

reports.title: Advanced Reports
reports.more: Dashboards by profile (applicant, institution, translator, admin) offer summary views: ongoing requests, active subscriptions, payment statistics, and action history for informed decision-making.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about ApplyOns

questions.q1: How does diploma verification work on ApplyOns?
questions.q2: How long does the verification process take?
questions.q3: What types of documents can I verify?
questions.q4: How is my data security ensured?
questions.q5: What are the costs associated with using ApplyOns?
questions.q6: What is the ADN code on ApplyOns?
questions.q7: Who can use ApplyOns (applicants, universities, translators)?
questions.q8: How do I invite an institution to attest my document?
questions.q9: Can I track my request status in real time?
questions.q10: How do I contact support or request a demo?

answers.a1: ApplyOns uses advanced technology to verify diploma authenticity directly with educational institutions. We ensure complete verification of information and signatures to guarantee document validity.
answers.a2: Verification time varies depending on the document type and institution. On average, the process takes 24 to 72 hours. For urgent verifications, we offer an express service with reduced timeframes.
answers.a3: We verify all types of academic credentials: university degrees, professional certificates, transcripts, and other educational documents. Each document is processed with the same level of rigor.
answers.a4: We use end-to-end encryption and advanced security protocols to protect your data. Our platform is GDPR compliant and our servers are hosted in secure data centers.
answers.a5: Our rates vary according to the type of service and level of verification required. We offer packages tailored to individual needs and customized enterprise solutions. Check our pricing page for more details.
answers.a6: The ADN code is a unique identifier assigned to each authenticated document. It allows institutions (universities, colleges, institutes) to securely submit the official attestation and enables authorized third parties to verify the document's authenticity at any time.
answers.a7: ApplyOns is for applicants (students, candidates), educational institutions (universities, embassies, large organizations), translators and agencies, as well as administrators. Each profile has a dedicated space and permissions suited to their role.
answers.a8: As an applicant, you create an authentication request, pay online, then assign or invite the relevant institution. The institution receives a notification and can submit the attested document via the ADN code (subject to an active subscription).
answers.a9: Yes. You can track the status of your applications and authentication requests from your dashboard: pending requests, submitted documents, notifications, and history are available in real time.
answers.a10: You can reach us by email (contact@applyons.com), via the contact form on the website, or by requesting a demo from our pricing page. Our sales team and support are available to assist you.

app.title: The ApplyOns Application
app.subtitle: A complete platform for managing applications, authenticating academic documents, and collaboration between applicants, institutions (universities, colleges, institutes), translators, and administrators.
app.rolesIntro: ApplyOns offers four account types, each with a dedicated space and appropriate permissions.

demandeur.title: Applicant
demandeur.description: Students, candidates, or individuals who submit requests and have their documents authenticated.

features.f2: Create document authentication requests (diplomas, transcripts, etc.)
features.f3: Pay online and invite an institution to attest the document
features.f4: View status and documents uploaded by the institution

institut.title: Institute / University / College
institut.description: Institutions that attest and upload documents (transcripts, diplomas) for authentication requests.

features.f1: View authentication requests assigned to them
features.f2: Access by ADN code to upload a document (with active subscription)
features.f3: Manage departments, programs, users, and subscriptions
features.f4: Receive notifications and manage standard requests (dossiers)

traducteur.title: Translator / Agency
traducteur.description: Translation agencies that process application dossiers and documents to be translated.

features.f1: Access dossiers to process and requests
features.f2: Upload translations and track dossier status

admin.title: Administrator
admin.description: Global oversight: users, organizations, requests, payments, subscriptions, and settings.

features.f1: Manage users, organizations, departments, and programs
features.f2: Authentication requests and standard requests, documents
features.f4: Configuration, permissions, audit logs, and support

app.modulesIntro: The main functional blocks available in the application.

demandes.title: Requests (applications)
demandes.desc: Create, track, and process application dossiers (requests) with workflow and statuses.

authDoc.title: Document authentication
authDoc.desc: Authentication requests with ADN code: applicant creates a request, pays, assigns or invites an institution that uploads the attested document.

abonnements.title: Subscriptions
abonnements.desc: Institutions subscribe to an active subscription to access upload by ADN code and advanced features.

paiements.title: Payments
paiements.desc: Payment for authentication requests and transaction management on the admin side.

organisations.title: Organizations
organisations.desc: Management of institutions (universities, institutes, colleges), departments, programs, and invitations.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.desc: Alerts and messages for new requests, uploaded documents, and status updates.

app.workflowIntro: From submitting the request to receiving the document attested by the institution.

workflow.step1: The applicant creates an authentication request (subject, document type) and receives a unique ADN code.
workflow.step2: The applicant pays online then selects an existing institution or invites one by email.
workflow.step3: The invited institution registers if needed, activates its account by email, then is linked to the request.
workflow.step4: The institution (with active subscription) accesses the request via the ADN code and uploads the document (PDF).
workflow.step5: The applicant and institution can view the document and status (documents received, processed, etc.).

app.ctaText: Ready to simplify your process? Create an account and access the dashboard.

offerPeaceOfMind: Give yourself peace of mind: Verify your diplomas with ease.
authenticateDocuments: Authenticate your academic documents with confidence.
simplifyValidation: Simplify the diploma validation process for students and institutions.
checkDocumentAuthenticity: Check the authenticity of a document

simplifyProcess.title: The Value of Verifying IDs, Diplomas, and Credentials
simplifyProcess.introduction: In an era where authenticity matters more than ever, verifying IDs, diplomas, and credentials offers significant benefits for individuals and organizations alike. Here's why this vital process should be a top priority:

benefit1.title: Establish Trust
benefit1.content: Verification fosters a culture of trust. Whether you're hiring a potential employee or admitting a new student, knowing that their credentials are authentic builds confidence in their abilities and character.

benefit2.title: Enhance Security
benefit2.content: In a world where identity theft and fraud are increasingly common, verifying IDs helps protect your organization from potential risks, ensuring that the individuals you engage with are who they claim to be.

benefit3.title: Mitigate Risk
benefit3.content: Verifying educational certificates and diplomas not only safeguards your institution's integrity but also reduces the risk of hiring unqualified personnel or admitting students who lack the necessary credentials.

benefit4.title: Streamline Processes
benefit4.content: Accurate verification expedites hiring and admissions processes by eliminating the need for repeated checks. When credentials are verified upfront, you can make informed decisions quickly and efficiently.

benefit5.title: Support Compliance
benefit5.content: Many industries are subject to regulatory requirements regarding the verification of qualifications. Implementing robust verification processes helps ensure compliance, avoiding costly fines and protecting your institution's reputation.

benefit6.title: Empower Fairness
benefit6.content: Ensuring that everyone's credentials are verified promotes equality in opportunities. It enables a fair and level playing field, allowing individuals to compete based on genuine qualifications.

benefit7.title: Cutting-edge Solutions
benefit7.content: With AuthenticPage's cutting-edge verification solutions, you can simplify the process while elevating the standard of truth and transparency in your organization.

simplifyProcess.conclusion: Join us in making authenticity the norm! AuthenticPage enables you to migrate and authenticate your documents with unprecedented speed and efficiency. Our platform is designed to reduce downtime and maximize productivity, making the process as smooth as possible. Enjoy seamless integration with real-time updates and enhanced security through our unique document DNA system. Our solutions give you complete peace of mind against the risks of document fraud and identity theft.

trustSecurity.title: Secure Your Future with AuthenticPage
trustSecurity.introduction: AuthenticPage offers a cutting-edge solution for diploma authentication, ensuring your credentials are recognized and valued worldwide.

benefit1.title: Global Recognition
benefit1.content: If you're looking to work or study abroad, authenticated diplomas are often a requirement for visa applications and job placements. AuthenticPage's secure cloud storage allows you to seamlessly share your verified credentials with institutions worldwide.

benefit2.title: Boost Your Credibility
benefit2.content: Employers increasingly focus on verified qualifications. Authenticating your diploma not only enhances your credibility but also opens doors to new career opportunities.

benefit3.title: Prevent Fraud
benefit3.content: With rising incidents of diploma mill scams, establishing your qualifications through our advanced fraud detection system ensures that your credentials are recognized and valued.

benefit4.title: Streamline Hiring Processes
benefit4.content: By providing verified documentation, you simplify the hiring process for prospective employers. This gives you a competitive edge, as they can trust the validity of your qualifications without further verification delays.

benefit5.title: Real-Time Updates
benefit5.content: Our innovative solution includes real-time authentication updates, ensuring that your credentials are always current and easily accessible. This flexibility allows you to focus on your career while we handle the verification.

benefit6.title: Peace of Mind
benefit6.content: With ApplyOns, you can trust that your valuable documents are secure and authentic. Our state-of-the-art technology guarantees that you, your employers, and academic institutions can verify your credentials effortlessly.

trustSecurity.conclusion: Don't leave your future to chance—ensure your diploma's authenticity with ApplyOns. Let's elevate your career possibilities together!

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: ApplyOns is the leader in document verification, trusted by government institutions, embassies, schools, businesses, and individuals worldwide. Our goal is to redefine security standards by providing an innovative solution that enhances trust and simplifies document management.
aboutUs.premierTxt: In today's digital age, document fraud and identity theft are significant concerns for government institutions, embassies, financial institutions, schools, businesses and individuals alike. The traditional methods of manually verifying documents are time-consuming, prone to human error, and do not offer real-time updates. This creates an opportunity for fraudulent individuals to manipulate or forge documents, leading to risks and consequences such as financial losses, legal disputes, reputational damage, and unsafety.
aboutUs.secondTxt: ApplyOns offers a cutting-edge solution to address the challenges associated with document verification. Through our automated process, we offer a seamless and efficient approach to track and verify the authenticity of important documents. By incorporating advanced fraud detection systems, secure cloud storage integration, and real-time authentication updates, we provide government institutions, embassies, financial institutions, businesses and individuals with a reliable and secure solution for document verification.

Our_Mission.title: Mission
Our_Mission.content: Our mission is to revolutionize the document verification process by providing an efficient and automated solution that ensures the authenticity and validity of important documents, ultimately reducing the risks associated with fraud.

Our_Vision.title: Vision
Our_Vision.content: Our vision is to become the leading provider of document authentication and verification services, trusted by government institutions, financial institutions, administrations, schools, businesses and individuals worldwide. We aim to set new industry standards and provide innovative solutions that enhance security and streamline document management processes.

Integrity.title: Integrity
Integrity.content: We act with honesty and transparency in all our interactions.

Innovation.title: Innovation
Innovation.content: We constantly seek to improve our services and adopt new technologies.

Accessibility.title: Accessibility
Accessibility.content: We believe that every student deserves equitable access to education.

premier.title: The Importance of Authenticating Your Diplomas
premier.subTitle: Trusted Security
premier.description1: Authenticating your diplomas is crucial in today’s competitive landscape, as it boosts your credibility, prevents fraud, enhances job prospects, and ensures that your qualifications are globally recognized by employers and educational institutions alike.

deuxieme.subTitle: Simplified Process
deuxieme.title: The Importance of Verifying Applicants' Identity and Credentials for Universities, Embassies, and Companies
deuxieme.description1: For Universities: Credential verification is vital for maintaining academic integrity, ensuring that students meet admission requirements, and safeguarding the value of their degrees. It helps universities uphold their reputation and protect against fraudulent applications.
deuxieme.description2: For Embassies: Verifying applicant identities and credentials are crucial for national security and immigration processes. Accurate verification helps embassies assess eligibility for visas, ensuring that only legitimate individuals receive entry, thereby strengthening global safety standards.
deuxieme.description3: For Companies: Identity and credential verification is essential for building a reliable workforce. It minimizes the risk of hiring or onboarding unqualified candidates, protects the company from potential legal issues, and fosters a workplace built on trust and transparency.

ServicesContent.title: Services
ServicesContent.subTitle: AuthenticPage is a Document Software Solution with 3 different tools:

1.title: Authentication and Verification Tool:
1.content: This tool is an advanced fraud verification system that utilizes new technologies such as micro-clouding to prove the provenance of documents through an authentication document number (ADN).

2.title: Mass Authentication Tool:
2.content: This tool is primarily for schools to help them authenticate hundreds of diplomas, certificates and finals in on click by generating Authentication Document Numbers to them.

3.title: Application Tool
3.content: Get your applicant document from the issuer in one click, see the progression on the checklist board and get notified when an application is ready for review.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to simplify the authentication process for diplomas and academic certificates for students and institutions. We are committed to providing a reliable platform that enhances trust in academic qualifications.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We aspire to become the global reference in academic document authentication, ensuring the security and integrity of information while facilitating access to education for all.

values.integrity: We act with honesty and transparency in all our interactions.
values.innovation: We constantly seek to improve our services and adopt new technologies.
values.accessibility: We believe that every student deserves equitable access to education.

content.title: Contact Us
content.paragraph1: We are here to answer all your questions and provide the assistance you need to validate your documents reliably and securely.
content.paragraph2: Feel free to contact us for any inquiries, technical support, or questions related to the authentication of your documents.

ContactContent.simplifiedValidationDesc: Our platform allows you to validate your diplomas in just a few clicks, without hassle or unnecessary paperwork. You can focus on what's essential: your professional future.
ContactContent.maximumSecurityDesc: Thanks to advanced technologies, including blockchain, your diplomas are protected against any falsification. Each validation is traceable and verifiable by potential employers, ensuring their authenticity.
ContactContent.internationalRecognitionDesc: Our services are designed to be accepted by institutions worldwide, facilitating your professional and academic mobility.
ContactContent.dedicatedSupportDesc: Our team is available to answer all your questions and guide you throughout the validation process.
ContactContent.testimonialsDesc: Discover how our services have helped other professionals gain a competitive edge in the job market.

FAQContent.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQContent.description: Find answers to common questions about AuthenticPage

faqItems.title: How can I authenticate my diploma?
faqItems.description: To authenticate your diploma, create an account on our platform and submit an authentication request. A fee of $50 will be charged for each request.

faqItems.title: Which institutions can use AuthenticPage?
faqItems.description: AuthenticPage can be used by a variety of institutions, including universities, academic schools, embassies, financial institutions, and businesses. Any organization or entity that needs to verify academic or official documents can benefit from using AuthenticPage.

faqItems.title: What is the subscription cost for institutions?
faqItems.description: Institutions can subscribe to AuthenticPage for $100 per month, providing them with unlimited access to document verification services. This subscription allows institutions to submit unlimited authentication requests for various types of documents.

faqItems.title: Are the data secure?
faqItems.description: Yes, AuthenticPage employs advanced security measures to protect sensitive data. We ensure the confidentiality of all user information through encryption, secure cloud storage, and real-time updates. Our platform adheres to high standards of data protection to prevent unauthorized access and ensure privacy.

faqItems.title: What should I do if I have issues with my authentication request?
faqItems.description: If you encounter any issues with your authentication request, please contact our customer support team via the contact page on our website. Our support team is ready to assist you and resolve any problems or questions you may have regarding the authentication process.

footerContent.title: Contact Us
footerContent.description: AuthenticPage is dedicated to providing a secure and efficient solution for authenticating diplomas and academic certificates.

termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsConditions.introduction: Welcome to AuthenticPage. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to our terms and conditions. This document aims to inform you of your rights and obligations as a user. We encourage you to read these terms carefully before using our services.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing our website, registering, or using any service provided by AuthenticPage, you confirm that you have read and accepted these terms and conditions. Any unauthorized use of the platform is strictly prohibited.
AuthenticPage reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect as soon as they are posted on this page, and it is your responsibility to review them regularly.

section2.title: 2. Use of the Platform
content: AuthenticPage is exclusively intended for the authentication and verification of academic and administrative documents. You agree not to use our platform for fraudulent, illegal, or unauthorized activities. Any violation of this policy may result in the suspension or termination of your account.

We also reserve the right to monitor the use of the platform to ensure that all users comply with our terms and conditions. Any attempt of unauthorized access to data or the security system will be reported to the relevant authorities.

section3.title: 3. Registration, Account, and Security
content: To use certain services on AuthenticPage, you must create an account by providing accurate, up-to-date, and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for any activities conducted with your account. If you suspect unauthorized use, contact our customer service immediately.
AuthenticPage is not responsible for any losses or damages resulting from your failure to protect your account. We recommend using a strong password and regularly updating your information.

section4.title: 4. Pricing and Payment
content: The pricing for services provided by AuthenticPage is listed on our site and may vary depending on the type of document and the service requested. Payments made are non-refundable unless otherwise specified in our refund policy.

All transactions are secured by modern payment protocols. By making a payment, you agree to provide accurate and complete payment information. AuthenticPage reserves the right to suspend accounts in case of non-payment or suspected fraud.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
content: All content on our site, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is protected by intellectual property rights. You may not reproduce, distribute, or exploit our content without prior written permission from AuthenticPage.
Any violation of intellectual property rights will result in legal actions and appropriate sanctions, including suspension or termination of access to services.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
content: AuthenticPage strives to provide a reliable and secure service but does not guarantee the absence of malfunctions or errors. We disclaim any liability for direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of our platform, except in the case of intentional wrongdoing on our part.
It is your responsibility to verify the validity and accuracy of the information provided before using our services for important decisions.

section7.title: 7. Modification of Terms
content: AuthenticPage reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions to reflect changes in legislation or improvements to our service. By continuing to use the platform after a modification, you accept the updated terms.

section8.title: 8. Termination
content: AuthenticPage may terminate or suspend your access to the platform if you violate these terms, if fraud is suspected, or for security reasons. In case of termination, any outstanding financial obligations remain due.

termsConditions.contact: For any questions regarding our terms and conditions, please feel free to contact us via our contact page. AuthenticPage is committed to providing you with a transparent and secure service.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to AuthenticPage's privacy policy. Protecting your privacy is essential to us, and we are committed to handling your personal information in a transparent and secure manner. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information while respecting your rights.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect personal information when you interact with our platform, such as when creating your account, submitting documents for verification, or requesting support. The information may include your name, email address, and the necessary documents for authentication.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: We use your information to provide our authentication and verification services, improve user experience, and personalize our offerings based on your needs. Additionally, with your consent, we may send you updates regarding new features and offers available on AuthenticPage.

section3.title: 3. Data Security and Protection
section3.content: AuthenticPage takes strict security measures to protect your personal information. Our servers are protected by advanced security protocols and encryption systems that ensure your information is securely stored. We also conduct regular audits to maintain the security of our infrastructure.

section4.title: 4. Sharing Information
section4.content: We share your information only when necessary to provide our services, such as with academic and financial partners for the authentication of your documents. We do not sell or disclose your information to third parties without your consent.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: Under data protection laws, you have the right to access your information, correct it, and request its deletion. You can exercise these rights by contacting us via our contact page. We are committed to addressing your request in a timely manner.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide our services or to comply with legal obligations. Once this period is over, your information is permanently deleted from our databases.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
section7.content: AuthenticPage may update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our services or to comply with new laws. We encourage you to check this page regularly to stay informed.

privacyPolicy.contact: If you have any questions or requests regarding privacy, feel free to contact us. We thank you for trusting us and are committed to responsibly protecting your personal information.

footer.description: Simplify your diploma verification with our secure and innovative platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and use your personal data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: At Applysons, the privacy of your data is our priority. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect different categories of data to provide you with optimal service:

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.description: The collected data is used for the following purposes:

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to secure your data, including:

items.monitoring: Monitoring and alerts for unauthorized access

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at privacy@applysons.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using Applysons, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with them, you must not use the platform.

services.title: Services Provided by Applysons
services.description: Applysons offers a platform for academic document authentication and tracking. Our main services include:

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.description: As a user, you agree to:

items.security: Ensure the confidentiality of your account
items.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
items.responsibility: Use the platform for lawful purposes only

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content on Applysons (logos, texts, graphics) is protected by intellectual property rights. Unauthorized use is strictly prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Applysons is not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the platform. We do not guarantee the authenticity of all submitted documents.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate your account at any time in case of a violation of these terms.

modifications.title: Changes to the Terms
modifications.description: Applysons may update these terms at any time. Users will be notified and should review the changes regularly.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@applysons.com.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How ApplyOns uses cookies and similar technologies.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: ApplyOns uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure the proper functioning of the platform, improve your experience, and comply with legal requirements. This policy applies to all our services.

what.title: What is a cookie?
what.description: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device when you visit a website. It allows us to:

items.usage: Secure access and analyze site usage in an aggregated manner

items.essential: Strictly necessary cookies: login, security, load balancing
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: audience measurement (anonymized or with consent)
items.security: Security cookies: protection against fraud and abuse

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: In accordance with GDPR and ePrivacy rules, non-essential cookies are only placed with your consent. You can change your choices at any time via settings or our consent banner.

manage.title: Managing cookies
manage.description: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. Note: disabling certain cookies may limit site functionality.

items.browser: Browser settings (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, etc.)

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: For any questions about this cookie policy: contact@applyons.com or via our contact form.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.subtitle: Legal information about the site and the publisher.

publisher.title: Site publisher
publisher.content:
ApplyOns
Diploma verification and authentication platform
For full company name, registered office, and identification number (e.g. SIRET, VAT), please contact us at contact@applyons.com. This information is also available on request for partners and institutions.

host.title: Hosting
host.content: The ApplyOns site and services are hosted by recognized providers in secure data centers compliant with international standards (availability, redundancy, physical and logical security). Data is processed in accordance with GDPR and applicable laws.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any legal or administrative questions: contact@applyons.com. For applicants and institutions: you can also use the contact form or in-app support.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All site content (texts, logos, graphics, software) is protected by copyright and trademark laws. Any unauthorized reproduction or use may be subject to legal action.

compliance.title: Compliance and personal data
compliance.content: The processing of personal data is described in our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy. We are committed to complying with the GDPR and applicable regulations in the countries where we operate.

governing.title: Governing law
governing.content: These legal notices are governed by the law applicable at the publisher's registered office. The Terms of Use and Privacy Policy specify the rules applicable to the services.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.subtitle: ApplyOns' commitments to protect your data and ensure platform reliability at an international level.

encryption.title: Encryption and data protection
encryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest. Documents and personal information are only accessible to authorized persons according to their role. We do not use your data for purposes other than providing the service and meeting legal obligations.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure and availability
infrastructure.description: Our services are hosted in secure data centers, with regular backups and business continuity plans. We aim for high availability for users and institutions worldwide.

compliance.title: Compliance and international standards
compliance.description: We comply with GDPR for EU residents' data and rely on international best practices for data protection and information security. Our processes are designed to evolve with local regulations.

international.title: International platform
international.description: ApplyOns is designed for users and institutions in multiple countries. Data flows and processing are documented and controlled to ensure compliance and trust wherever the platform is used.

commitment.title: Ongoing commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to maintaining a high level of security, training our teams, and evolving our measures in line with threats and regulatory requirements. The trust of our users and partners is at the heart of our approach.

summary.title: In summary
summary.description: ApplyOns places security and compliance at the center of its offering. Whether you are an applicant, institution, or partner, we strive to provide a reliable and transparent environment suited to the requirements of an international platform.
summary.contact: For any questions: contact@applyons.com or via the Contact page.
